title: ADC OR MID
body:
Recently i've been sucking at playing mid idk why, so my brain decided " yow dude how about you play adc " so i tried playing adc even i barely play it, but i watch qtpie alot and learn a lot from him playing adc. Im actually good, like very good. Im so good at attack moving, but I cant decide which one to pick is it mid or adc can you guys help me.
Like cons pros something like that.

replies.body:
As a person who mains support/mid,

**ADC:**

* I can say playing ADC is ALOT of mechanics (micro gameplay) you have to know how to kite and position yourself.

* You must work **with your support** to survive your laning phase and move swiftly into midgame (considered your team doesn't feed the other lanes/jgler)
* Be prepared for an autofill support who won't know how to prep minion waves etc.

**Mid**

* You have to know how to win or go even in lane. Otherwise, some mid laners can snowball very hard and usually my teammates will flame (_'omg that fizz just one shot me, thanks, ori')
* Roaming becomes more important since your in the 'middle of the map' literally.
* Pro is, you don't have to rely on a support but it in saying so, you and your jgler would need to in some sense synergize.

There's probably heaps I haven't covered and some things I've listed above may not be 'correct' but I guess its just my opinion :) 

GLHF!! 

Tldr: you hate auto filled supports? Go mid!
